events.name: Discovery of Wooden Pleistocene Tools Demonstrates Earliest Recorded Complex Technology in East Asia
events.description: Pleistocene tools uncovered from the Gantangqing site in China are the oldest complex wooden technology ever discovered in East Asia.

generated_content.title: Ufo Mysteries in Charleville-Mézières, Ardennes - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the mysterious Charleville-Mézières, a town in eastern France where the discovery of wooden Pleistocene tools has revealed complex technology in East Asia. Visit the UFO-themed museum and take part in extraterrestrial-inspired events.
